summary:
## Palme d'Or

The Palme d'Or is the top prize at the Cannes Film Festival, given to the best feature film. It started in 1955, replacing the Grand Prix which was the top prize before. The Palme d'Or was paused in the 1960s but returned in 1975. It's one of the most respected awards in movies.
title: Palme d'Or
